mapper.select: SELECT a.member_id memberId ,b.student_name studentName ,b.student_gender studentGender ,b.student_phone studentPhone ,b.student_address studentAddress ,b.student_detailaddress studentDetailAddress ,b.student_email studentEmail ,b.student_education studentEducation ,a.member_active memberActive FROM member_id AS a INNER JOIN student AS b ON a.member_id = b.member_id
